summary: Adds five elf eared followers. Standalone.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8112/8605578772_5f15315bc6_b.jpg[/img]
[color=#EEF966]May. 08, '13 - [b]UPDATE v1.1[/b][/color]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Update female textures with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35327/]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]. Thank you hellosanta![/color]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Makeup options are also updated with new tint textures.[/color]
[url=http://www.flickr.com/photos/sarasta/8719596837/][img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7405/8719596837_95328bd7fe_m.jpg[/img][/url]
[color=#999999][i]NEW face, teeth, and eyebrows textures[/i][/color]

[color=#EEF966]Apr. 20, '13 - [b]Character Ranking[/b][/color]
[color=#DDDDDD]A ranking summed up the posted comments from Mar. 29, '13 to Apr. 20, '13. See Article page for details.[/color]


[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8122/8605578756_d8b3a4c34c_b.jpg[/img]

This mod adds five elf eared followers.
You can find them in [color=#EEF966][b]The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun[/b][/color].

This mod is standalone, [color=#EEF966][b]you don't need any additional mods (including UNP body) to be installed[/b][/color].

All followers are marriageable, protected*, min 10 to max 100 level, and have Light Foot perk.
[color=#888888]* "Protected" means they can be killed by player but no one else.
You can make them "essential" (never die) by follower overhaul mod like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]EFF[/url], or console command "SetEssential".[/color]

[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8507/8600191040_cce0497af4_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8235/8600191032_eb8673f13b_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8237/8599091665_7766c0b71b_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8518/8599091681_92a5fb3d9c_b.jpg[/img]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8250/8600191062_e27bccf7a7_b.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/225049]>> More Screenshots[/url]

Some followers have alternation skill, but they have no alternation spells.
(Because you might not want them to cast alternation buffs when you take a screenshot.)
You need to use follower overhaul mod like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]EFF[/url] to make them cast alternation spells.



[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8246/8607479235_87042d994c_b.jpg[/img]

Unzip and copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder. Or simply use NMM.
Activate your desired follower's esp file(s) in Data Files in the game launcher.

To update from older version, simply overwrite all files.


[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8102/8604547899_0c8ef5cb91_b.jpg[/img]

[size=3][color=#FFE000]Vivid Makeup for Ilta[/color][/size]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8396/8633051157_55f311b54b.jpg[/img]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Replaces Ilta's textures and hair style.
-High resolution facetint texture included. Don't install if you experienced problems with Maisa.
-NMM installation recommended. You can revert easily.[/color]

[size=3][color=#FFE000]Kirsikka's First Makeup[/color][/size]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8527/8613038768_ec60745c20.jpg[/img]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Replaces Kirsikka's textures.
-High resolution facetint texture included. Don't install if you experienced problems with Maisa.
-NMM installation recommended. You can revert easily.
-Credits: Warpaint painted by Maisa, cosmetics offered by Ilta, hair dye and eye color change potion mixed by Sarasta.[/color]


[size=3][color=#FFE000]No Tattoo Texture for Maisa[/color][/size]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8385/8611931185_7b1d32115d.jpg[/img]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Removes Maisa's tattoos.
-This option will also fix problems Maisa might cause in particular environment.[/color]


[size=3][color=#FFE000]Playable Character Saves[/color][/size]
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8252/8608911988_888338ef17_n.jpg[/img]
[color=#DDDDDD]-Each follower's slot data for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] 1.0 or higher.
-Some textures and a guide (readme.txt) included.[/color]



[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8113/8605578784_7b35d07dcf_b.jpg[/img]

Q: How can I change their equipment/spell/AI/protection setting?
[color=#AADDDD]A: Use follower overhaul mod like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]EFF[/url].[/color]

Q: Are they working with CBBE?
[color=#AADDDD]A: Yes. This mod is standalone. They work properly no matter what body you use.[/color]

Q: Can you make CBBE version?
[color=#AADDDD]A: No. I regard their body as one of their personalities.[/color]

Q: In that screenshot, what's the armor he/she wear?
[color=#AADDDD]A: See Credits section below.[/color]

Q: He/She is too tall/short for me.
[color=#AADDDD]A: First, open console. Next, click him/her. Then type "setscale 1.0" (or whatever number you like).[/color]

Q: I cannot find any followers in The Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.
[color=#AADDDD]A: If your Skyrim version is below 1.9.32.0, update it.
Deactivate all follower's esps from this mod and make a clean save. Then activate the esps again and load the saved game.[/color]

Q: I lost them! Where have they gone?
[color=#AADDDD]A: Open console, then type "player.moveto [RefID]".
To check their RefID, click them while console is open. Yes, you need to load a save you haven't lost them yet.[/color]

Q: My follower's skin are all/partly unusual white/black/purple.
[color=#AADDDD]A: Set "Texture Quality" to "High" in Options in the game launcher.[/color]

Q: Apparently this mod causes CTD/loading problem.
[color=#AADDDD]A: Apparently your environment (other mods, computer spec, Skyrim version, etc) cannot handle high resolution textures this mod uses. Try the following steps.
-Make sure your Skyrim is up to date.
-Deactivate esp(s) you don't really need.
-Install No Tattoo Texture for Maisa, and uninstall Makeup options if installed.
-Compress and/or resize textures into smaller size if possible. (Do it at your own risk. I'm not supporting.)
-Not solved yet? Sorry, I cannot help you. Rebuilding your environment or a new computer might help. [/color]



[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8121/8605578782_af6c3f53bf_b.jpg[/img]

[b][size=3]Credits[/size][/b]
